dmca.title: Chinese site YouABC complains of copying
dmca.body:
Dear Google, Inc.


1. I, the webmaster of www.youabc.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our site.


The offender is www.517free.com. They copied a number of contents from our website as listed below without our authorization. You may also find proof via archive.org to see pages of youabc.com's old versions. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages both Chinese version and English version.


2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website www.youabc.com with the total amount of 104 pages:

(1). Search Query: 颇    B林K韵

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.youabc.com/shijiazhuang/jingdian/tianguishan/

Infringing Web Pages:

www.517free.com/zh-cn/shijiazhuang.asp (From )Bqo: to 门h30 C/人 are our copyrighted content.)

www.517free.com/zh-tw/shijiazhuang.asp (traditional Chinese characters version) (From )Bqo@ to
